Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg

Interface Request

All Known Subinterfaces:
RequestWithContent
All Known Implementing Classes:
ErsatzRequest, ErsatzRequestWithContent
public interface Request
Configuration interface for HTTP request expectations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Request
    called()
    Configures a call count verifier such that at least one call is expected.
    default Request
    called(int count)
    Configures a call count verifier such that the number of calls must be equivalent to the provided count.
    Request
    called(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Integer> callVerifier)
    Allows the specification of a custom call verifier so that the number of times the request is called may be matched.

  • Method Details

    • secure

      default Request secure()
      Specifies that the request is secure (HTTPS).
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • secure

      Request secure(boolean enabled)
      Specifies whether the request is secure (HTTPS vs HTTP) or not.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true if the request is secure (HTTPS)
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • header

      default Request header(String name, String value)
      Specifies a request header to be configured in the expected request. The value specified must match one of the request header values mapped to the expected header name. Multiple header specification may be added to the expectations; each specified header must exist in the request.
      Parameters:
      name - the header name
      value - the header value
      Returns:
      this request

    • header

      default Request header(String name, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Iterable<? super String>> matcher)
      Specifies a request header matcher to be configured in the expected request. If multiple matchers are defined with this method, each must match successfully for the request to be matched.
      Parameters:
      name - the header name
      matcher - the header value matcher
      Returns:
      this request

    • header

      Request header(HeaderMatcher headerMatcher)
      Specifies a request header matcher to be configured in the expected request. If multiple matchers are defined with this method, each must match successfully for the request to be matched.
      Parameters:
      headerMatcher - the header matcher
      Returns:
      this request

    • headers

      default Request headers(Map<String,Object> heads)
      Specifies request headers as a Map of names to values to be configured in the expected request. The map values may be String or Matcher<Iterable<String>> instances.
      Parameters:
      heads - the map of headers
      Returns:
      this request

    • query

      default Request query(String name, String value)
      Used to specify a request query parameter to be configured in the expected request. As per the HTTP spec, the query string parameters may be specified multiple times with different values to denote a parameter with multiple values.
      Parameters:
      name - the parameter name
      value - the parameter value
      Returns:
      this request

    • query

      default Request query(String name)
      Used to specify that the request has the given query string, with no care about its value.
      Parameters:
      name - the parameter name
      Returns:
      this request

    • query

      Request query(QueryParamMatcher queryMatcher)
      Used to specify that the request must have a query parameter matching the provided matcher.
      Parameters:
      queryMatcher - the query param matcher
      Returns:
      this request

    • query

      default Request query(String name, Iterable<? super String> values)
      Used to specify a request query parameter to be configured in the expected request. As per the HTTP spec, the query string parameters may be specified multiple times with different values to denote a parameter with multiple values.
      Parameters:
      name - the parameter name
      values - the list of values
      Returns:
      this request

    • query

      default Request query(String name, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Iterable<? super String>> matcher)
      Used to specify a request query parameter to be configured in the expected request. As per the HTTP spec, the query string parameters may be specified multiple times with different values to denote a parameter with multiple values.
      Parameters:
      name - the parameter name
      matcher - the query string matcher
      Returns:
      this request

    • queries

      default Request queries(Map<String,Object> map)
      Used to specify a map of request query parameters for configuration on the expected request. The map values may be Strings or Matchers.
      Parameters:
      map - the map of query parameters
      Returns:
      this request

    • cookie

      default Request cookie(String name, String value)
      Specifies a request cookie to be configured with the given name and value.
      Parameters:
      name - the cookie name
      value - the cookie value
      Returns:
      this request

    • cookie

      default Request cookie(String name, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Cookie> matcher)
      Specifies a request cookie to be configured with the given name and matcher.
      Parameters:
      name - the cookie name
      matcher - the cookie matcher
      Returns:
      this request

    • cookie

      Request cookie(RequestCookieMatcher cookieMatcher)
      Specifies a request cookie to be configured with the given matcher.
      Parameters:
      cookieMatcher - the request cookie matcher
      Returns:
      this request

    • listener

      Request listener(Consumer<ClientRequest> listener)
      Specifies a listener which will be called with the active request whenever this request is matched at test-time.
      Parameters:
      listener - the request call listener
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • called

      Request called(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Integer> callVerifier)
      Allows the specification of a custom call verifier so that the number of times the request is called may be matched.
      Parameters:
      callVerifier - the verifier to be used
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • called

      default Request called(int count)
      Configures a call count verifier such that the number of calls must be equivalent to the provided count. This is analogous to calling called(equalTo(n)).
      Parameters:
      count - the expected call count
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • called

      default Request called()
      Configures a call count verifier such that at least one call is expected. This is analogous to calling called(greaterThanOrEqualTo(1)).
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • matcher

      Request matcher(org.hamcrest.Matcher<ClientRequest> matcher)
      Configures a matcher for the ClientRequest, which allows ad-hoc matching based on the request. This does not disallow using other matcher methods, but be careful to consider any potential overlaps or unintended exclusions.
      Parameters:
      matcher - a matcher based on the ClientRequest object
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • responds

      Response responds()
      Initiates the definition of a response for this request.
      Returns:
      a response for this request, for configuration

    • responder

      Request responder(Consumer<Response> responder)
      Allows for configuration of a Response by the given Consumer, which will have a Response object passed into it.
      Parameters:
      responder - the Consumer<Response> to provide configuration of the response
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • forward

      default Request forward(String targetUri)
      Causes the response to be generated from the result of making the request against another target server. The request will be matched by normal means, and the response will be the resulting response from the target server, making the same request.
      Parameters:
      targetUri - the target URI
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • forward

      Request forward(URI targetUri)
      Causes the response to be generated from the result of making the request against another target server. The request will be matched by normal means, and the response will be the resulting response from the target server, making the same request.
      Parameters:
      targetUri - the target URI
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • forward

      default Request forward(URL targetUrl)
      Causes the response to be generated from the result of making the request against another target server. The request will be matched by normal means, and the response will be the resulting response from the target server, making the same request.
      Parameters:
      targetUrl - the target URL
      Returns:
      a reference to this request
